description:
High performance revitalising shower gel for after-sport, 100% engineered for men.

Our 1st Camphor enriched shower gel acts in 5 ways to help you relax after sport; deeply cleanses, instantly cools, invigorates skin, hydrates and with a relaxing fragrance. Whether you're the captain of a football team, a gym junkie or just a casual sportsman, Invincible Sport shower gel is your shower staple to feel instantly cool, clean and revitalised. The spicy aromatic fragrance is all you will smell of post-workout - the ultimate revitalising shower gel for face, body and hair.

Suitable for face, body and hair.

Enriched with Camphor.

Your after-sport wakeup call.

Relaxing camphor & citrus fragrance.
name: L'oreal Men Expert Invincible Sport Shower Gel 300mL
